name: South Park: The Fractured but Whole - Collector's Edition Gold
summary:
The Collector's Edition Gold includes: 
The complete game. 
The Season Pass. 
A Steelbook case. 
A set of physical lithographic prints with art from South Park Studios. 
A six-inch replica figurine of “The Coon” by UbiCollectibles and ArtToyz. 
 
Towelie: Your Gaming Bud will be available at launch for those who pre-order the Collector’s Edition, and in January 2017 for those who purchase the Collector’s Edition after December 6, 2016.
